paper_abstract: It is proven that any Dembowski-Ostrom polynomial is planar if and only if its evaluation map is 2-to-1, which can be used to explain some known planar Dembowski-Ostrom polynomials. A direct connection between a planar Dembowski-Ostrom polynomial and a permutation polynomial is established if the corresponding semifield is of odd dimension over its nucleus. In addition, all commutative semifields of order 3(5) are classified.
paper_title: Further results on planar DO functions and commutative semifields
